line_1: Think Dressing of Dinner the Height of all Science,
line_2: And to Peace, and good Humour bid open Defiance.

line_1: Scoffs at the pedant and the science:
line_2: The fop, with learning at defiance,
And Whigs and Tories in alliance;

line_1: But FLORIO knew the WORLD, that Science
line_2: Set Sense and Learning at defiance;

line_1: For Play will then become a Science.
line_2: To Grammar Rules we'll bid Defiance;
which plainly shews the near Alliance
